# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia function wrap_string(text::String; text_width::Int = 10)
    words = split(text, " ")
    lines = []
    current_line = ""

    for word in words
        if length(current_line) + length(word) + 1 > text_width
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = string(word)
        else
            current_line *= " $(word) "
        end
    end

    push!(lines, current_line)
    join(lines, "\n")
end

# Example
wrap_string("Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.") # "Lorem ipsum\n dolor sit amet,\n consectetur adipiscing elit,\n sed do eiusmod tempor\n incididunt ut labore et\n dolore magna aliqua."
```
